Spec.title: Level 12-30 Getting RF Ready & Possibly Sustaining
Level 95+ Single Cluster Setup + Aegis Melding

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
For any potential questions or if you feel you get stuck at all don't forget to check out my RF WIKI ^5 Pohx.Net ^7
Here's a list of what auras you can expect to run in the early-mid game. Note: you can possibly add skitterbots during act 4,5,6 but it depends on your MAX mana & mana management.
Act 1 - ^1Vitality ^7
Act 2 - ^1Vitality & ^6Herald of Thunder ^7(optional for more damage)
Act 3 - ^1Vitality,^6 Purity of Elements ^7
Act 4 - ^1Vitality,^6 Purity of Elements ^7
Act 5 -^1 Vitality,^6 Purity of Elements ^7
Act 6 - ^1Vitality, ^6Purity of Elements ^7
Act 7 -^6 Purity of Elements, ^1Determination ^7 (only drop vitality after you ascend for the 2nd time and get Pious Path. You can still use it but make sure to have around 30 mana unreserved)
Act 8 -^6 Purity of Elements, ^1Determination ^7
Act 9 - ^6Purity of Elements, ^1Determination^7
Act 10 -^6 Purity of Elements, ^1Determination, ^x7070FF^7
Sometime in Maps.^1 Determination, ^x7070FFMalevolence^7, ^6Tempest Shield. ^1 Note: We drop Purity of Elements here. To Secure your Freeze & Shock Immunity. ^2
^7Deeper into the build (prob 85-92+) ^1Determination, ^x8888FFMalevolence^7, ^6Tempest Shield, & ^2^xD02090Skitterbot.^7 ^2(This requires Loathing Chest craft for reservation, Charisma Anoint & the 2 Mana nodes to unlock the Mana Reservation Mastery)
^4To gain Shock immunity after dropping Purity of elements make sure to use ^6Tempest Shield ^4To gain Freeze Immunity after dropping Purity of Elements make sure to have the ^6Brine King Pantheon ^4& unlock Freeze Immunity via Divine Vessel.
Note: For the shield craft for Block Based setup I usually go with Pristine Life Fossils to hit the 5% Max life gain on block.
^xD02090TATTOOS^7 I'm personally running about 10-12 of the STR Ngamahu Warmonger with Explode. & a few INT ones for Reduced Crit Damage taken
Loyalty Tattoo of Kiloava is very good for block based, it summons a unit who gives you bonus life & es gain on block
The +1 Dex Gems & Int Gems are very useful but very expensive
The +1 Max cold res is very strong for Melding of the Flesh Setup.
^xD02090
Few notes for people who want to min-max a bit
For players wanting to get 90% all res. You can elevate the cold res on gloves for +1 Max which puts you to 87 All. You can also Min-Max your Chest influenced to hit a purity of ice breakpoint on aura effect (Every 25%) This will grant you +2 Max res putting you at 89% There are other ways to do this such as using brutal restraint or Impossible Escape.
You can use a mavens Jewel Impossible Escape at CI/Supreme Ego
There are many watchers eye combos that work. You can check my website for a list of all usable ones.
There are not too many Forbidden Flesh & Flames and one of the good ones is Hierophant % mana eff but it's really expensive.
Mage blood is very good for the build but I will not be making Mirror Tier PoB's
Brutal Restraint should be used in templar area by divine judgement.
For Cluster Jewel Advice Watch this video --> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N_KQG0xvNj0 Then watch it again --> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N_KQG0xvNj0

Skill.label: Flame Wall (Shoot Rolling Magma into this)

Frostblink (You can also use Arcane Surge Here)

^5Lifetap - ^5^7This should only be maxed on RF&FT

^2You can sustain RF here if you stack Fire Res

Righteous Fire (can work unlinked till later)

Leap Slam (Can switch to shield charge)
Wave of conviction (There is no way you need this)

Stone Golem - I drop this when it starts dying

Wave of conviction Or Exposure Gloves

Molten Shell - Lifetap prob not needed
